reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, soft, and comfortable, appreciating that it can be dressed up or down. Moreover, they like its appearance, with one customer noting it adds a touch of sexy style. However, the fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it awesome while others say it doesn't sit properly off the shoulder. Additionally, the material quality and sizing also get mixed reviews, with some loving th

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made sweater-cute for holiday
items.body: I would size up if you want it to be a little looser or not fitted. But quality is great and it is really cute Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Cute Holiday Sweater
items.body: Really cute sweater. I love the slight stretch to it and the off the shoulder style. It's slightly thin which is good because I tend to run warm and living in California I do not want anything heavy. It's perfect for weekend wear or to dress up for work during the holidays. Read more
items.author: Beachday1

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Weak seems but so comfy.
items.body: This was a great sweater until the season one side completely unraveled. Too bad too cause I loved the feel and fit. Read more
items.author: Evie Mae

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice
items.body: Thin and off the shoulder. Not too hot for the az winter. Read more
items.author: danette davis

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater if not for the dyeing traces
items.body: Such a great sweater, I really like the material and the shape (sized up for a more relaxed look). Such a shame for the dyeing traces - I bought 3 colors and they're all the same :( They make the sweater look creased when it's not, and these 'darker color traces' don't disappear after washing Read more
items.author: Aurore

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress up or down
items.body: Super cute and super soft! I bought the khaki color. I would say it isn’t quite sweatshirt material but it is comfy and fits like a sweatshirt. Could easily dress up or down. I will be purchasing a few more colors. I am 5’4 and weigh 115 for reference. I bought the small which fits but I could probably size down (which I will do in my next order) to an XS for a more fitted look. Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s nice for the price!
items.body: I ordered an XS. I am 105 pounds and 5’2” tall. The shape is very big and baggy and it’s only slightly off of one shoulder. The navy blue color is very nice, and for the money I think it’s a good value. I don’t normally order clothes on Amazon but this is a good winter wardrobe filler. Read more
items.author: Kenneth whittemore

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poorly made, came apart when I put it on
items.body: Very poor quality. I bought this on a sale. I got it and tried it on and it was fine - it fit, I liked it. I hung it up in the closet and waited for the Christmas season. Went to put it on and the side seam ripped all the way down. Now that it's been a while, I can't return it. I tried to stitch it up myself, but if I missed just one loop the whole thing can unravel. As far as others not liking the material, it's not like a traditional sweater material. It's kind of smooth and flat. There's no "fluff" like a traditional sweater. It's kind of in between a sweatshirt and t-shirt in thickness. It's not very thick. This didn't bother me, but I'm just trying to describe what it's like. Read more
items.author: Julie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red, F Black White, Khaki, White, F Green White, Black, Navy Blue, F Red White, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
